title: Puns
body: I really do think that playing with a Rioter that has the ability to  Net ({{champion:51}} ) puns of my _caliber_ would really improve my skill at League of Legends, so what I am asking you please dont {{summoner:11}} me down and {{champion:64}}  to me playing with Phreak or Cactopus would really provide {{summoner:13}} to my mind because I need to know how to make the best puns because {{champion:103}}{{champion:64}}  wanna be the best.

replies.body: Then come around and play sometime, we crack jokes a lot :p
